# Damn Ugly Chat
It is a fun project that I wrote. Me and some of my friends were on a remote session and we were using notepad to chat as we all were connected to the same machine. So I wrote this very small program, which I call **Damn Ugly Chat** to solve just that. You can type in your message and press enter and it will popup in the message box.That is is it!

# Useage:
It was intended to be used in data uri format. Here are the steps so that you can run it now:
 
1) Copy the following line and paste it in your browser ***(Don't be scared looking at those random numbers and characters, it is just the html encoded in base64)***:
  ```
data:text/html;base64, 
  ```
2) ***Bookmark*** it for future use.
3) **Tadaa!** That is it, next time you want to use it just open the bookmark.
